# Summon Weapon (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Summoning Spells|summoning]])

**Level:** [[2nd Level Assassin Spells|Assassin 2]], [[2nd Level Bard Spells|Bard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 swift action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** 0 ft***.***

**Effect:** Nonmagical light weapon

**Duration:** 1 round/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Complete Mage (WotC)Â­, pg. 118

*A weapon appears in your hand, ready for use.*

You conjure a nonmagical light weapon sized for you. The weapon is normal in every respect. It can't be made of any unusual metal, nor is it masterwork.
